Articles.Content:
I was playing today and after a kerbin hit the ground harder than I would have liked the screen went black and only the HUD elements were still visible. I returned to space center to find the same situation. I have tried reloading the save file but everything is still black. I also am unable to click anything other than the menu button.

Hopefully someone knows how to fix this. Thanks in advance for your help!

If it's not a too catastrophic occurrence, you might be able to fix it just by restarting KSP. This a rare glitch, and all we really know about it is that it has to do with how the kerbals collide with the ground and sometimes other objects.

For the most part, it does not end up ruining save files, but in some cases it will. In those cases, there's unfortunately not a lot that can be done.
